content: The full Ebongold Set of Armor and Gear is located in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain upon defeating Black Bear Guai at the end of the Chapter. From Chapter 2 onwards you can then craft this gear at any Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Ebongold_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Ebongold Set'.
The content is as follows:
The full Ebongold Set of Armor and Gear is located in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain upon defeating Black Bear Guai at the end of the Chapter. From Chapter 2 onwards you can then craft this gear at any Shrine.
